mapper.insert: insert into hz_school_year (resource_id, `name`, start_time, end_time, is_delete, creator_id, create_time) values (#{resourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{endTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update hz_school_year set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=DATE}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=DATE}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where resource_id = #{resourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select resource_id, `name`, start_time, end_time, is_delete, creator_id, create_time from hz_school_year
